about_the_game:
Dive into what lies below in “Beneath the Cherry Blossom Tree” an immersive visual novel where every choice carves a path through a tapestry of mystery, romance, and intrigue. Unravel a story that intertwines destiny, personality, and local folklore
About This Game:
* In “Beneath the Cherry Blossom Tree,” you assume the role of a high school student, in a vibrant and dynamic school. Beneath its playful facade lies a web of secrets waiting to be uncovered. Navigate through a narrative where your decisions not only shape the story but also define who you become.
Key Features:
* Branching Narratives: Your choices matter, leading to multiple endings and unforeseen consequences. Every decision opens new paths while closing others.
* Rich Storytelling: Delve into a deeply engaging plot set against the backdrop of a mysteriously captivating town, full of characters with hidden agendas and stories.
* Mysteries: Unravel complex mysteries that challenge your wit and reward your persistence, each unlocking new mysteries and lore.
* Atmospheric World: Explore environments, from the haunting woods to the vibrant school halls, all brought to life with unique art and a captivating soundtrack.
* Dynamic Relationships: Build or burn bridges with the school’s students. Your interactions with them can provide crucial clues or lead you astray.
* Hidden Secrets: Discover collectibles and secrets hidden throughout the game, each offering glimpses into the town's true history and lore.

Who Will You Become?
* In “Beneath The Cherry Blossom Tree” you're not just solving a mystery; you're shaping the very fabric of its narrative. Will you uncover the truth that lies buried beneath, or will dark secrets consume you? The choice is yours.

Special Note:
* This game contains mature content, including themes of sexual assault, drug and alcohol abuse, self-harm, psychological elements, and choice-driven consequences that may not be suitable for all audiences.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is non-notarized. May not work with 10.15 Catalina
